name: Stevo's Quest
description:
Stevo loves his country, however he does not love taxes. Therefore he wishes not to participate in such atrocious acts. After eating a very funny mushroom he gets a visit from the mysterious Noseman informing him that the bureaucrats have come for him because of his tax fraud.

Stevo has to leave the safety of his cozy cottage to defeat the bureaucrats, save the world and finally become a free man exempt from taxes.

What kind of mushroom was that? What can be trusted? What is real? Perchance.

Input:

AD - Left and right

Space - Jump

Right Mouse - Fire weapon / Use item

R - Reload

E - Pick up or interact with item

Tab - Open inventory / Accept item

Escape - Pause / Decline item

Scroll or numbers to equip weapon

Left Mouse in inventory - Inspect weapon
